messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello Crew, Please keep the station clean

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Isacc Calm ya self, Todays mission is the DNA Vault, The leaders of this mission is the science and engineering divisions

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I give up as being captain. Most of the staff has the mental age of 7 and dont know what the hell safety is or carring for others. is
